Subject: Re: The Brotherhood Acts

::Whistler::
    He looked up at the three bots.  They dwarfed him.  He would still fight. 
 He looked between them.  Vehement was focused on Hot Rod, whom he'd seen 
fight, no sense in wasting time there.  Reflector and Kluster were also 
engaged in battle.  That left Sun Crusher.  Whistler stepped in front of Iron 
Raptor.  "You are the commander.  I am expendable.  You are not."  With that 
small amount of explanation.  He extended his claws and leapt at Sun Crusher. 
 (His claws are strange.  He has four that begin on the back of his hand and 
curve along the fingers of his fist.)
